title: Slow Cooker Seasoned Chicken, Potatoes and Green Beans
directions: Start by placing the chicken in a 6-quart slow cooker, in the center. Next add the green beans on one side. Then for the potatoes, you will need to mound them high off to the other side.
In a medium sized bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, oregano, salt, pepper, onion powder and garlic cloves.
Pour this mixture evenly over the chicken, green beans and potatoes.
Cover and cook on HIGH for 4 hours, without opening the lid during the cooking time.
Note- Do NOT use lemon juice out of squeeze bottle and expect this to taste good!
ingredients: ½ lb. fresh green beans, trimmed (about 2.5 cups)
